settings.heading: Headphones Engineered For Heavy Metal: Now Available!

settings.text: Experience headphones crafted for heavy metal. Featuring 2 frequency ranges and 8 drivers, dive into your metal tracks the way they deserve to be heard.

settings.heading_1: World’s first Headphones built for Metal Fans to mimic live music events
settings.heading_2: 8 Drivers with patented placements create optimal sound fields
settings.heading_3: 5 microphones, 50 hour battery life, soft and replaceable ear cups, plus Hell Blocker(TM)  noise cancellation technology

settings.description_1: Experience immersive audio with the precision of 8 drivers, covering multiple frequency ranges. Enjoy a superior listening experience characterized by exceptional clarity, richness, and depth.

Axel Grell, known as the “Godfather of German Sound”, formed a team of like-minded metalhead engineers to deliver a unique experience to the underserved Metal Community. With over 30 years in the audio industry and 40+ patents, your experiencing a lifetime of dedication.

Our ears are naturally designed to pick up sound that originates in front of us. Heavys unique, patented technology utilizes 8 drivers, four of which, are positioned to the front of the ear. The result in an optimal entry to the inner ear and the most natural sound experience possible.

Hell Blocker(TM) noise cancellation, 50 hours of continuous play battery life, 5 microphones, ultra-soft, replaceable earcups, Bluetooth to synch with any phone or device, plus a wired option. And yes, ALL your music genres will also sound great with HEAVYS.

settings.heading: Engineered by Industry Legend Axel Grell
settings.video: shopify://files/videos/Behind Heavys Tech | Axel Grell Interview.mp4

settings.text: Feel the power of personalization with Heavys Shells™. Transform your headphones with a variety of designs and styles. Shred out in style with Heavys.

settings.heading: What top industry professionals have to say...
What’s in the box?
settings.row_content:
With your purchase, you will get a tech-packed brand new pair of Heavys black headphones. The headphones arrive with a triple-purpose USB-C cable that can be used for charging,  listening, and for Firmware updates.

If you want to listen in wired mode through an AUX connection, you can purchase our AUX cables as add-ons. Heavys offers 2 lengths of 3.5 to 2.5 mm AUX cables: normal length 1.3 meters (~4.25 ft) or extra long 3 meters (~9.85 ft).

For additional accessories such as a travel case, visit here: https://www.heavys.com/collections/frontpage

settings.heading: When will my order be shipped?
settings.row_content: Good news! Heavys are in stock and ready for immediate shipment! As soon as you place your order, we'll process it swiftly. H1H backorders are also being expedited. We've already dispatched most pre-orders, and the remainder will be sent out by October 2023. Rest assured, you'll receive an email with a tracking number once your order is on its way.

settings.heading: Does shipping costs cover local taxes and fees?
settings.row_content: For taxes, every country has its own taxes and procedures. You are responsible for paying any taxes or specific country duties, if applicable, in your country or state as with any other consumer electronic goods ordered online.

settings.heading: How will Heavys sound when listening to other music genres?
settings.row_content:
Heavys headphones are designed to be great headphones at an affordable price for any music genre.

They pack strong spec and technological innovation that helps create a great all-around set of headphones. As we are geared for heavy music, the features complement that (such as loudness enhancement w/o hearing damage), but that does not mean you will not have an awesome listening experience in other musical environments.

settings.heading: How is the battery life?
settings.row_content:
Our battery lasts 50 hours without ANC (Noise-canceling, aka Hell Blocker), and 40hrs with ANC.
Like any electrical device, extreme cold may damage the battery, we do not recommend taking the headphones out to temperatures below -20℃.

settings.heading: Will there be a Heavys mobile app?
settings.row_content: Certainly, we are currently developing an app that will include firmware updates and enable the management of specific headphone features and incorporate some exciting new advancements in the near future. The app will launch towards the end of 2023.

settings.heading: How do I replace the shells?
settings.row_content:
The shell is attached by four grooves in the H1H headphones located on the outside of the cup. In order to detach the shell, place your thumb on one side for leverage and use your middle and index fingers on the other side to pull the shell off the cup.

In order to mount the new shell, place it in the same place as the old one and push until you hear a click.

settings.title: David J.
settings.text: "Just got mine. Oh man. Definitely worth the wait. Thee best headphones I've ever listened to. And trust me I've been through a lot."

settings.title: Matt N.
settings.text: "I've got mine. Give your ears some time to adjust to them and they're incredible. Especially Atmospheric Black Metal or really anything that has a little more going on. The sound stage of these is fantastic."

settings.title: Roman W.
settings.text: "I got mine today, honestly I'd say it was worth the wait. The noise cancellation is some of the best I've had, and the build quality is far better than expected"

settings.title: Luis B.
settings.text: "I was honestly anxious about receiving the headphones but I got them on Monday and I am blown away. These are literally the 1st headphones that fit my large head comfortably."

settings.title: Jay T.
settings.text: "Received my @heavysaudio headphones today while I was at work. And the sound on it is PHENOMENAL! TOO SWEET! So glad I got these headphones pre ordered months ago..."

settings.title: Evan H.
settings.text: "Got my pair and tested it for a solid day, amazing sound quality, fits my head really snug, was definitely worth the wait."

settings.title: Gavin L.
settings.text: "As a recent receiver of my pair, I just wanted to pass on how good these are for anyone thinking of getting a pair. I've got quite a few well regarded headphones, Grado HF-1, Beyerdynamic DT770's, Denon 2000's etc. None convey Metal music with the accuracy, tone, presentation and authority of the HEAVYS. (Awesome bass speed, impact & depth) They sound great at all listening levels, and surprisingly good for other genre's of music, Highly recommended."

settings.title: Joe T.
settings.text: "So, barring how goofy these look on me (albeit, I think that's a ME problem '-;) they SOUND AMAZING. I'm an over the ear headphone junkie. I'm embarrassed to say how many pairs I own. After tuning these with Wavelet, I can listen to EVERY genre of music I enjoy with these. I mean from acoustic, 80s cheese rock, Metallica, Tool, Beastie Boys, worship music, DMB, 311, grunge....etc... it ALL passes the test. And not just barely; they rival some of my big boys."

settings.title: Iris M.
settings.text: "These Heavys arrived today, and holy shitballs nre they loud AF, sound is amazing, and they feel super sturdy! Hell of an upgrade from my pair of Sennheisers! I,

settings.title: @liquidcosmosphoto
settings.text: Too all of my metalheads friends al iu followers - get thes @heavysaudio headphones ASAP! Everything about them is beyond perfect - especially if you have elephant ears, like me. Soft and comfy, no pressure on my earlobes, easy controls, but most important - THE SOUND IS FUCKING UNREAL! I've used pro-level studio headphones in my days (have to confess, it's been a while since I've recorded anything) nd these headphones are on-par with the best of best! @ingested latest album delivered an unforgettable maiden experience - it almost felt like I'm in the studio next to the console listening to the final mix! THANK YOU @heavysaudio for this incredible piece of technology! THANK YOU @ingested and @the_slam_king for all of the love and some of the heaviest metal on this planet! THANK YOU @callofthevoidphoto for always delivering dope shit

settings.title: Tyler L.
settings.text: "Received mine today. The sound is incredible and not overwhelming at all. They accentuate individual instruments/ vox well and really compliment well-produced songs. I've listened to Infant Annihilator, Slaughter To Prevail, Lorna Shore, Lorde, Juice Wrld, and Post Malone so far and am yet to be disappointed."

settings.title: @zachgateshere
settings.text:
"Worth repeating that these are the real fucking deal. I haven't touched my Audeze, Grado, or Senns since they came in. It absolutely sounds like listening to big ass amps at a concert. I plug them in when I'm at my desktop and go wireless everywhere else.

Got my new Heavys Heavy Metal Headphones out and charging. Going to fire them up for the first time with Polaris FATALISM that should drop tonight at 9 P.M. in California. Been waiting years for this one! "

settings.title: Gaiti H.
settings.text: "Vo Davos they are incredible they make me speechless lt-w well done at #heavys "
